trigger_prototype.name: HW failure on {HOST.HOST}
Operational status for {#FANVAL} on {HOST.HOST} is CRITICAL
Operational status for {#FANVAL} on {HOST.HOST} is FAILED
Operational status for {#FANVAL} on {HOST.HOST} is WARNING
Operational status for {#FANVAL} on {HOST.HOST} was changed
Operational status for {#POWERSUP} on {HOST.HOST} is CRITICAL
Operational status for {#POWERSUP} on {HOST.HOST} is FAILED
Operational status for {#POWERSUP} on {HOST.HOST} is WARNING
Operational status for {#POWERSUP} on {HOST.HOST} was changed
Operational status for sensor {#CHASSISTEMP} on {HOST.HOST} is CRITICAL
Operational status for sensor {#CHASSISTEMP} on {HOST.HOST} is FAILED
Operational status for sensor {#CHASSISTEMP} on {HOST.HOST} is WARNING
Operational status for sensor {#CHASSISTEMP} on {HOST.HOST} was changed
{HOST.HOST} {#IFNAME} HIGH INPUT ERRORS

trigger_prototype.expression: {Cisco interfaces template:ifOperStatus[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2 and {Cisco interfaces template:ifAlias[{#SNMPINDEX}].regexp("(INFRA|TRUNK|JOINT|UPLINK|PEER)")}=1 and {Cisco interfaces template:ifName[{#SNMPINDEX}].regexp("^(Fa|Gi|Te|Po)")}=1 and {Cisco interfaces template:ifName[{#SNMPINDEX}].regexp(.*\.[0-9]+)}=0 and {Cisco interfaces template:ifAdminStatus[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<>2
trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.HOST} {#IFNAME} DOWN
{HOST.HOST} {#IFNAME} High input broadcast traffic
{HOST.HOST} {#IFNAME} High input broadcast traffic burst
{HOST.HOST} {#IFNAME} High input traffic burst
{HOST.HOST} {#IFNAME} High input traffic decrease
{HOST.HOST} {#IFNAME} Input traffic over 80%
{HOST.HOST} {#IFNAME} Input traffic over 90%

trigger_prototype.expression: {Cisco interfaces template:ifHCInOctets[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<20000 and {Cisco interfaces template:ifAlias[{#SNMPINDEX}].regexp("(INFRA|TRUNK|JOINT|UPLINK|PEER)")}=1 and {Cisco interfaces template:ifName[{#SNMPINDEX}].regexp("^(Fa|Gi|Te|Po)")}=1 and {Cisco interfaces template:ifName[{#SNMPINDEX}].regexp(.*\.[0-9]+)}=0 and {Cisco interfaces template:ifOperStatus[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=1
trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.HOST} {#IFNAME} Low input traffic
